name: Resignation of registered agent
text:
(a)  A registered agent may resign from the registered agent's appointment by signing and delivering to the director for filing, a signed statement of resignation.  The statement may include a statement that the registered office shall also be discontinued.
     (b)  The registered agent shall mail one copy to the registered office (if not discontinued) and the other copy to the limited partnership at its principal office.
     (c)  The appointment of the agent shall be terminated, and the registered office discontinued if so provided, on the thirty-first day after the date on which the statement was filed. [L 2003, c 210, pt of §1]
 
 
         [Section effective July 1, 2010.  For section effective until June 30, 2010, see above.]  A registered agent may resign from the registered agent's appointment by complying with the requirements of section 425R-10. [L 2003, c 210, pt of §1; am L 2009, c 55, §42]
